How to Use Customer Data to BUILD Trust ${CTAText} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> As a financial institution, you collect an abundance of powerful data; data you can use to better understand your customers’ spending habits, intents, and the needs they may not even recognize they have.
As many consumers are facing new financial challenges and stricter budgets, are conducting more purchases digitally and have more return claims to keep track of, they’re seeking your guidance and advice to help manage their financial lives.
Financial institutions like {{company.Company Name:default=yours}} have already built a foundation of trust—and have the unparalleled ability to support their customers in times of need by taking advantage of the tools and data at their disposal.
Listen to our on-demand webinar to hear NCR and Sensibill discuss how you can leverage your data and insights to create personalized experiences that strengthen your customer relationships and drive engagement. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Did you know?
You can get free marketing campaign toolkits, customizable campaigns, videos, research reports and more to help {{company.Company Name:default=you}} differentiate with digital. Start here <[[https://www.ncr.com/banking/digital-banking/2020/digital-transformation?utm_source=outbound_email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=acceleratingdigital&utm_content=email4&utm_industry=digital-banking]]>.
